content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Oil Extraction System at (17.5,40.5)
- **Pumpjack** at (17.5,40.5) - Extracts crude oil (299970 crude oil remaining)
- **Storage tank** at (21.5,41.5) - Stores crude oil (currently holding 39.2 crude oil)
- Connected by PipeGroup (fluid_system=610) for crude oil transport

### Power Generation System at (26.5,42.0)
- **Offshore pump** at (-11.5,21.5) - Provides water
- **Boiler** at (26.5,42.0) - Burns coal to heat water (currently has 41 coal)
- **Steam engine** at (29.5,42.5) - Generates 13500 energy from steam
- Connected by:
  - PipeGroup (fluid_system=601) for water transport
  - PipeGroup (fluid_system=611) for steam transport
- Powered by electricity group (id=374) with 6 small electric poles

## ERROR TIPS

### Pipe network access errors
- Verify pipe groups exist before accessing them (StopIteration error when querying fluid_system=249)
- Use get_entities() with proper filters to locate existing pipe groups

### Power connection issues
- Ensure power poles are properly connected to all electrical devices
- Verify power production meets consumption requirements

### Inventory management
- Check inventory capacity before attempting to insert items
- Boiler can only hold 50 coal - don't attempt to insert more than capacity

### Fluid system monitoring
- Track fluid system IDs as they may change (original water system 249 not found, new system is 601)
- Verify fluid connections when adding new pipes or tanks

### General placement
- Verify target position is clear before placing new entities
- Ensure proper spacing between entities to allow connections

### Production monitoring
- Current oil production (848/min) exceeds target (250/min) by 339%
- Consider optimizing pumpjack operation if resource conservation is desired
